Title: Logs Side Panel UI Update
introduction: We redesigned the Logs side panel for improved readability and LLM debugging. The new interface allows for more efficient testing and refinement of LLM outputs.

New.description: You can now group filters in Logs and save it as a new view.
You can now group filters in Traces and save it as a new view.
You can now run Evals or add scores to a span in Traces.
You can now open an experiment from Prompts.

Improved.description: Updated model configurations to reduce errors.

Fixed.description: Fixed log refreshing when users view detailed logs.
